body_html:
After some experimentation, I found that to be able to reproduce the error, the dataset does not need to be changed, but changes do need to be made to one or more of the parameters EMBEDDING_SIZE, N_FILTERS, and WINDOW_SIZE. For example, setting these parameters to the following causes the error.

EMBEDDING_SIZE = 16
N_FILTERS = 16
WINDOW_SIZE = 29

various values of WINDOW_SIZE were tried and some cause the error and some don't. Larger values tend to cause the error (29,30,31,32) while smaller values don't (20,21,22).

I'll update the original report to indicate this.

EMBEDDING_SIZE = 16
N_FILTERS = 16
WINDOW_SIZE = 29

various values of WINDOW_SIZE were tried and some cause the error and some don't.  Larger values tend to cause the error (29,30,31,32) while smaller values don't (20,21,22).
I'll update the original report to indicate this.
body:
After some experimentation, I found that to be able to reproduce the error, the dataset does not need to be changed, but changes do need to be made to one or more of the parameters **EMBEDDING_SIZE**,  **N_FILTERS**, and **WINDOW_SIZE**.  For example, setting these parameters to the following causes the error.

```
EMBEDDING_SIZE = 16
N_FILTERS = 16
WINDOW_SIZE = 29
```

various values of **WINDOW_SIZE** were tried and some cause the error and some don't.  Larger values tend to cause the error (29,30,31,32) while smaller values don't (20,21,22). 

I'll update the original report to indicate this.
